title: How to lock device when kept unlocked by trusted agent
content:
I would like to lock the device some time in my home also. But it is kept unlocked by Trusted Agent. Earlier I can tap to lock icon on the home screen to force lock the screen. But it is not happening in Android 10. How can i do so in Android 10. Please guide me with the steps.

Thanks In Advance
Cheers
Subhodip
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4
